      Handles incoming messages received from the server.
      Specified by:

      message - The message received from the server.
      Returns:

    • chooseCards

      public Message chooseCards()
      gets from std input one to three coordinates ensures that the arrayList containing these coordinates is dim one to three and contains valid coordinates ensures that the dimension of the arrayList isn't greater than maxInsertable in bookshelf ensures that the cards are picked in a line from the board
